CompanyDescription: SLM Corporation, more commonly known as Sallie Mae, is the premier financial brand for college and continuous education. We are in the business of building prosperous futures by providing access, planning outcomes, and helping students and families responsibly fund their future. We believe education, in all forms, is the foundation for success, an equalizer of opportunities, and a proven pathway to economic mobility.
